div.a: CSAL - Community School for Apprenticeship Learning logo

h1.a: CSAL - Community School for Apprenticeship Learning

div.p:
Charter schools are publicly-funded schools that are run independently of the school district.
Charter schools are run by a not-for-profit organization governed by a board of directors
comprised of parents, educators and business leaders in the community. Learn More...

a.aria-label: Show calendar view for Main Calendar
Show all events from Main Calendar

td.br: The CSAL, Inc. System remains committed to the safety and wellbeing of its students, employees and visitors. In light of current concerns of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic and concerns about exposure in Louisiana, our campuses remain closed. However, each school has individual educational plans designed for its students. See more details below..

You can download school applications to complete. Submissions with supporting documentation should be mailed to CSAL Inc. District, 4962 Florida Blvd. Baton Rouge, LA 70806 or dropped off to our District Office drop box by the front door. Applications are included in this link
